title: The Brooklyn subway shooting suspect has been denied bail. 4 survivors are still in the hospital - CNN
content:
1. The Brooklyn subway shooting suspect has been denied bail. 4 survivors are still in the hospital  CNN
  2. With ‘all the monitoring, the cameras,’ CT public transit is safe, officials say, following NY subway shooting  CT Insider
  3. New York subway shooter makes court appearance  23 ABC News | KERO
  4. Faulty internet node cut camera feed at Brooklyn subway station during shooting | amNewYork  AMNY
  5. The Toxic Culture That Produced the Subway Shooter Is All Around Us | Opinion  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Four survivors were still hospitalized Thursday, two days after a mass shooting on a subway train left New Yorkers badly shaken and forced a reckoning over passenger security on the largest public transportation system in the country.
